item.title: interface check C#
item.description: #A small script to check interfaces on C# To reject certificate check: <system.net> <settings> <servicePointManager checkCertificateName="false" checkCertificateRevocationList="false" /> </settings> </system.net> In the application config file. Some useful links: Check if a file exists: https://msdn.microsoft.com/es-es/library/system.io.file.exists%28v=vs.110%29.aspx How to write to a text file: https://msdn.microsoft.com/es-es/library/8bh11f1k.aspx How to download files from FTP: https://msdn.microsoft.com/es-es/library/ms229711(v=vs.110).aspx How to sleep a thread: https://msdn.microsoft.com/es-es/library/d00bd51t(v=vs.110).aspx Problems related to FTP with SSL: Ignore SSL validation for certificates: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12506575/how-to-ignore-the-certificate-check-when-ssl Configure FTP over SSL http://stackoverflow.
